questionText: Some people say you should be cautious about making major changes in life. Suppose these people are located at 1. Others say that you will never achieve much in life unless you act boldly. Suppose these people are located at 7. Others have views in between. Where would you place yourself on this scale?
In general, it is easy for me to accept taking risks.
options: very easy, easy, neither easy or difficult, difficult, very difficult
